mapper.select: SELECT Article.*, User.name as writerName, User.img as writerImg, (SELECT count(*) FROM Comment WHERE Comment.articleId = Article.articleId and Comment.deletedAt is null)+ (SELECT count(*) FROM Comment JOIN Recomment ON Comment.commentId = Recomment.commentId WHERE Comment.articleId = Article.articleId and Recomment.deletedAt is null) as commentCnt FROM Article join User ON Article.writerId = User.id WHERE boardId=#{boardId} AND deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY regDate DESC;

SELECT Article.*, User.name as writerName, User.img as writerImg, (SELECT count(*) FROM Comment WHERE Comment.articleId = Article.articleId and Comment.deletedAt is null)+ (SELECT count(*) FROM Comment JOIN Recomment ON Comment.commentId = Recomment.commentId WHERE Comment.articleId = Article.articleId and Recomment.deletedAt is null) as commentCnt FROM Article join User ON Article.writerId = User.id WHERE ArticleId=#{articleId} AND deletedAt IS NULL ORDER BY regDate DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Article(boardId, articleId, title, writerId, isAnonymous, content, img) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{articleId}, #{title}, #{writerId}, #{isAnonymous}, #{content}, #{img})
mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET deletedAt=now() WHERE articleId = #{articleId}
UPDATE Article SET viewCnt = viewCnt+1 WHERE articleId = #{articleId}
UPDATE Article SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, isAnonymous=#{isAnonymous}, updateDate = now() WHERE articleId=#{articleId}
